name: mf-shell
description: Shell goals: - lazy load components   - use the file id's in order to ignore identical files    - if a mf needs a subtag of another component, load it - create custom layouts   - allow to load multiple layouts - load mf based on route and layout   - a mf is loaded if the selected layout needs it    - only main elements can be added in a layout   - some mecanism which allows to only patialy reload the page. for example only the content part of the layout changes, than only this is changed
author: Nico Vogel
